entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 6:47AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rivers Rising Sharply... Sharp rises are occuring on rivers draining the south slopes of the Brooks Range east of the Dalton Highway, and on the Nenana River, Delta River, and the Upper Tanana River from Delta East. No flooding is expected, but rivers will run high with logs and other debris in the river.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Southeastern Brooks Range
